activityCategory: WASH-1. Water Access
indicatorName: Girls - Other affected Population- # benefiting from improved access to safe water in schools and in the host communities.
comments:
Improvement of access to safe water and sanitation for  Syrian refugees and Jordanians in most-affected communities through rehabilitation of water supply infrastructure and sanitation services in public buildings.  

Water supply intervention to be conducted simultaneously with sanitation infrastructure rehabilitation. As such results for activities for WASH rehabilitation will be reported under WASH1.3 to avoid duplication. 

Syrian children in Urban benefiting from improved access to WASH facilities in schools:50
Other affected Population in Urban  benefiting from improved WASH facilities in schools:795

activity: 4. Improvement/extension/rehabilitation
activityCategory: WASH-1. Water Access
indicatorName: Syrian Boys in Urban - # benefiting from improved access to safe water in schools and in the host communities.
comments:
Improvement of access to safe water and sanitation for  Syrian refugees and Jordanians in most-affected communities through rehabilitation of water supply infrastructure and sanitation services in public buildings.  

Water supply intervention to be conducted simultaneously with sanitation infrastructure rehabilitation. As such results for activities for WASH rehabilitation will be reported under WASH1.3 to avoid duplication.
